bibl.title: with contributions by Zofia Sztetyllo and Aleksandra, Remains of a Ptolemaic Villa at Athribis.
bibl.note: Tell Atrib, Polish Excavations 1985. Ptolemaic house, middle of the IIIrd c. B.C. - beginning of the Ist c. B.C. (fragments of statuary, statuettes of Aphrodite, limestone stela with a figure of Bes, a terracotta figurine of the Nile-god, pottery, amphorae stamps, coins).
Mysliwiec Karol, with contributions by Zofia Sztetyllo and Aleksandra, Remains of a Ptolemaic Villa at Athribis.
